STYLE.NAME: Common Perry
STYLE.NOTES: Mild, medium to medium sweet drink made from culinary/table fruit (often pears). Entrants MUST specify carbonation level (still petillant or sparking) and sweetness (dry, medium, sweet)
STYLE.PROFILE: Relatively full body. Pear character, but not obviously fruity. Low to moderate tannin/astringency. Slightly cloudy to clear, generally pale. No bitterness.
STYLE.INGREDIENTS: Pears with some sugar adjuncts. High gravity wine, champagne or ale yeast.
